name: Well of Life
description:
Well of life

Well of Life is a 3D Tower Defense Game, which takes place in a fantasy World.
The Monsters of a forest live in peace, but are scattered. The constant incursion of humans, into the forest of the monsters,pushes them further and further back to the center of the forest. The middle of the forest houses the Well of Life. Legends say the water of the well can heal wounds and can cure any illness and a powerful mage can turn the water of the well into a potion of eternal youth. That is why the humans are constantly attacking the forest and the monsters. They destroy the forests and every creature in their way to obtain this mighty gift of nature.

Between all those Monsters there are three siblings. In distress, they gathered all monster clans together, to defeat all human intruders and to finally live in peace together.

There will be most likely an update or more :)

Controls

Left Mouse Click: Select tile, build tower on tile
Right Mouse Click: Move Selected Monster to mouse position
1,2,3: Select Monster
Q: Previous Monster
E: Next Monster
F: Deselect all monsters
ESC / P: Pause Menu

Day Camera:
Click + drag: look around,
WASD: move
Scroll Wheel: Up / Down
